actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to restore the deduction for State and local taxes on gasoline and other motor fuels and to allow the deduction for such taxes without regard to whether the taxpayer itemizes other deductions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for State and local taxes on gasoline and other motor fuels and to make such deduction available to taxpayers who do not itemize deductions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to restore the deduction for State and local taxes on gasoline and other motor fuels and to allow the deduction for such taxes without regard to whether the taxpayer itemizes other deductions.
